description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget page called NoteEditorPage, which allows creating and editing notes in a note-taking app. It includes UI components for inputting note title and content, saving, deleting notes, and navigation logic.

classes.name: NoteEditorPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that facilitates creating and editing notes.

classes.name: _NoteEditorPageState
classes.description: State class for NoteEditorPage managing UI interactions and business logic.

methods.name: push
methods.description: Static method to navigate to the NoteEditorPage and optionally receive a Note object upon return.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes text controllers with existing note data if present.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text controllers to free resources.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves the note data, either creating a new note or updating an existing one.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the current note after user confirmation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method constructing the UI for note editing, including fields and action buttons.
